programme.title: Gunman of One Hundred Crosses
programme.desc: An Irishman is killed in the wild West. His son Jimmy goes out searching for the killers of his father, but is soon ambushed by two highwaymen, and killed, too.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger (Klinton Spilsbury) of an ambush arranged by outlaw leader Major Bartholomew "Butch" Cavendish (Christopher Lloyd) returns to fight back as a great masked western hero, The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: Dead Men Don't Count
programme.desc: Two gunmen ride into a town with a plan to collect a large unearned bounty but are caught up in the local war for land caused by the impending arrival of the railroad.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A border town is thrust into political chaos when a Mexican bandit targets US soldiers, killing them relentlessly. As tensions escalate between the US and Mexico, the bandit becomes a symbol of defiance. The town becomes a battleground, with both sides caught in a dangerous game of revenge and retaliation.

programme.title: Three Ruthless Ones
programme.desc: The Walker brothers took different paths—one an outlaw, one a Marshal, one a rancher. Yet they share one goal: avenging their father’s murder. When they finally find the killer, their clashing ideals lead to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Shoot the Living and Pray for the Dead
programme.desc: After Dan Hogan and his gang rob a bank, they hire a mysterious man to guide them across the Mexican border in return for half of the loot.

programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: Six Bounty Killers for a Massacre
programme.desc: The Governor of Kansas hires six gunfighters to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the self-appointed sheriff of Abilene who is holding several hostages including his family.

programme.title: I'll Die for Vengeance
programme.desc: A Mexican gang headed by vicious Pedro terrorizes the land between New Mexico and Arizona.

programme.title: Silent Thunder
programme.desc: A US Marshal teams up with two bank robbers to track down five kidnapped prostitutes. But their captors aren’t ordinary outlaws—they are terrifying, otherworldly creatures lurking in the desert. As the unlikely trio ventures into the unknown, they face horrors beyond their imagination in a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Buddy Goes West
programme.desc: Two outlaws, "The Doctor" and the Indian Girolamo, help a village fight a gang and a corrupt sheriff who has discovered gold beneath the town.

programme.title: $100,000 for a Killing
programme.desc: $100,000 for a Killing - Johnny Forest, bounty hunter, attempts to carry out his mother's dying wish that he bring in his outlaw brother, Clint, alive.

programme.title: My Name is Pecos
programme.desc: Everyone wants to know who the Mexican is. He always answer slowly, "my name is Pecos". Pecos Martinez to be exact, and he's returned to his hometown of Houston to settle up with Clain, the leader of a gang of cut-throats. Clain is busy looking for the money from a recent robbery that's been stolen from him. Soon the stolen cash in Pecos' vengeance entwine and all hell breaks loose. Behind the scenes a Bible touting Undertaker (Umberto Raho), a cowardly saloon owner, & a helpful saloon girl become part of the story. This film made Woods as internationally known as Pecos in the third world countries as Franco Nero was known for Django. A Mexican hero against a gang and a town full of gringos- what more could you ask for?

programme.title: Killer Goodbye
programme.desc: A young man goes back to his hometown ten years after killing the killer of his parents. Once there he is asked to help the sheriff.

programme.title: The Reward's Yours... The Man's Mine
programme.desc: A group of killers seek out wanted gunman El Puro for the $10,000 dollar reward.
